input_args.text:
'David Duke October 26, 2016 
Today Dr. Duke discussed the state of his campaign, including television commercials that he was preparing. He will be in a televised debate with the other leading candidates, which should be critical in putting him in the run off. 
Pastor Mark Dankof took over the show at the break. He took calls from listeners. One call asked about Jesusâ\x80\x99s warning about the Synagogue of Satan. Pastor Dankof ended the show with a passionate warning about the risk of World War III should Hillary be elections. 
This is another great show that you wonâ\x80\x99t want to miss.'
